Name: tgrelid
column6: the table this trigger is on

Name: tgname
column6: trigger name (must be unique among triggers of same table)

Name: tgisconstraint
column6: true if trigger implements a referential integrity constraint

Name: tgconstrrelid
column6: the table referenced by an referential integrity constraint

Name: tgnargs
column6: number of argument strings passed to trigger function

Name: tgargs
column6: argument strings to pass to trigger, each null-terminated
